name: 王耀德
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程分上、下二學期，本學期之上課內容包含電學、磁學、電磁波、光學、及近代物理簡介。
schedule:
1.Ch-22：Electrostatics
2.Ch-23：The Electric Field
3.Ch-24：Gauss's Law
4.Ch-25：Electric Potential
5.Ch-26：Capacitors & Dielectrics
6.Ch-27：Current & Resistance
7.Ch-28：Direct Current Circuits
8.Ch-29：The Magnetic Field
9.Review & Midterm Exam
10.Ch-30：Sources of The Magnetic Field
11.Ch-31：Electromagnetic Induction
12.Ch-32：Inductance & Magnetic Materials
13.Ch-33：Alternating Current Circuits
14.Ch-34：Maxwell's Equations; Electromagnetic Waves
15.Ch-35 ~ 36：Geometric Optics
16.Ch-37 ~ 38：Wave Optics
17.Ch-39 ~ 41：Introduction to Modern Physics
18.Final Exam
scorePolicy:
quiz:10% x 2 + 15% x 1
midterm:25%
final:25%
homeworks:15%
participation:extra:5%
